name: backend
description: API Rest de cadastro de clientes e DB MySQL

scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.prestart: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all

author: Thais Kotovicz <thais_kotovicz@gmail.com>
